issue.subject: Resource visualization layer is added twice to the map
issue.description:
The visualization link, built in metadata sheet view, allows user to open a map in which a 'previsualization layer' of the resource is added.
This layer is actually added twice since the external libraries (geoext and gxp) were upgraded.

details.name: subject
details.old_value: Resource vizualisation layer is added twice to the map
